definitions.definition: that can help you to do or achieve what you want
definitions.sensetop: useful to somebodyuseful for somebody/somethinguseful for doing somethingit is useful to do somethingit is useful for somebody to do somethinguseful in somethinguseful in doing something

examples.contextForm: it is useful to do something

examples.text: It is useful for students to receive constructive feedback on their progress.
examples.contextForm: it is useful for somebody to do something
